title: Rep. Ro Khanna | The Check In: Trump’s Unqualified Federal Judge Appointments
description:
Seth takes a break from breaking news to check in on Trump appointing unqualified federal judges to serve lifetime appointments.

Then, Representative Ro Khanna talks about the impeachment inquiry into Donald Trump, Congress regulating big tech and supporting Bernie Sanders. He also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
